title: As Dom and Jess Lever celebrate their new baby where are their fellow Love Islanders now?
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

It was a long hot summer of love back in 2017.

But as winter came around and the fame frost hardened our Love Islanders went in all sorts of different directions.

For Love Island's success story Jess Shears and Dom Lever, their fairy tale really did come true as they swiftly moved in together, wed and welcomed their baby daughter this week after finding romance in the villa.

Here we take a look at the highs, lows and sad tragedies of our favourite Love Island class - 2017.

(Image: ITV)

Kem Cetinay

(Image: ITV)

Barber Kem, 23, won the 2017 show with then girlfriend Amber Davies.

After a few awful segments with Amber on Lorraine, the pair swiftly broke up and Kem did a stint on Dancing On Ice.

There was also *that* single Little Bit Leave It with Chris Hughes which charted at number 15 on the UK Singles Chart.

(Image: ITV)

Kem also did a series with old pal Chris called You vs Chris and Kem.

Now he can be found on the This Morning sofa as an entertainment reporter.

Amber Davies

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

After a string of high profile modelling jobs for Boux Avenue and a standard clothing line, Amber, 23, landed the part of Judy in West End smash 9 to 5.

Viewers will remember Amber told Kem that starring in a musical was her dream.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Brett D. Cove / SplashNews.com)

Romantically she has been linked with TOWIE's Chris Clark and heartthrob Liam Payne.

Camilla Thurlow and Jamie Jewitt

(Image: Rex Features)

(Image: WireImage)

These two are still together and recently moved into their first rental property after staying with Camilla's parents since leaving the villa.

Since leaving Love Island Camilla, 30, set up a business with Jamie and the pair continue to do admirable charity work.

(Image: Camilla Thurlow/Instagram)

Cam landed a spin off show What Camilla Did Next about her work with the Halo Trust.

The cute couple are currently on an African safari.

Chris Hughes

(Image: ITV)

After releasing a Little Bit Leave It with pal Kem and taking part in that disastrous spin off show with Olivia Attwood , Chris settled into a role as a brand ambassador.

From golfing to bookies, the 24-year-old piled in the promotional work before landing a job as a racing pundit on ITV 2.

(Image: ITV Picture Desk)

Before he ditched Olivia he was pursued by Katie Price - he later went on to share her flirty WhatsApp messages before apologising.

(Image: Rex Features)

(Image: Instagram)

He is currently dating Little Mix' Jesy Nelson.

Olivia Attwood

(Image: WENN)

Are you ok Hun? Liv left Love Island with polar bear Chris Hughes but their relationship soured as they filmed their spin off show.

Chris later dumped her in front of the cameras in emotional scenes.

She later reconciled with ex Bradley Dack before landing a gig on Celebs Go Dating where she broke the rules and snogged fellow celeb Sam Crask.

(Image: Instagram)

Despite the cynicism over her single status Olivia and Sam were a couple at the end of the series.

They later split and she is now living in Manchester with footballer Bradley.

As well as a huge tanning contract Olivia is starring in Towie and most recently hurled a bowl of green olivies at her co-star during a drunken screaming match.

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

Never change Liv!

Marcel Somerville

(Image: PA)

Marcel 'I'm was in Blazin' Squad' left the villa with fitness instructor Gabby Allen before splitting on holiday after she discovered he was cheating on her.

Since leaving the villa Marcel, 33, has released a book (Calling Doctor Marcel), a single and is currently a radio presenter / DJ.

He also helped the GC after she fell down the hole at the Radio 1 Teen Awards in 2017,

Not forgetting the Blazing Squad tour coming soon to a town near you.

(Image: Getty)

Gabby Allen

(Image: REX/Shutterstock)

Fitness instructor Gabby Allen ditched boyfriend Marcel after discovering he cheated on her when she was in the gym.

She then started dating Rak-Su's Myles Stephenson before dumping him for sending flirty texts to another woman.

After a stint in Celebrity Big Brother the fitness guru released a healthy lifestyle book Shape Up with Gabby Allen: Fast Food + Dynamic Workouts.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for Boo)

Montana Brown

(Image: ITV)

Montana left the villa with Alex 'carved by the Gods' Beattie but their relationship was the shortest in Love Island history and sources said they barely spoke since the cameras stopped rolling.

After a stint presenting on MTV Montana is now co-owner of swim wear brand Swim Society.

(Image: ITV)

Influencer Montana is in a relationship with model Elliott Reeder and has campaigned for more support for those suffering from depression and anxiety.

Jonny Mitchell

(Image: Instagram)

Love rat Jonny Mitchell wasn't the most popular Love Island participant (after he dumped Camilla for newcomer Tyla), but his recent stint on Celebrity Big Brother has seen him thaw some formerly frosty fans .

Jonny revealed he was engaged to girlfriend Danielle Zarb-Cousin after nine months of dating.

(Image: ITV)

Mike Thalassitis

(Image: ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

Mike appeared on both Celebrity Dinner Date and Celebs Go Dating, but didn't manage to find love.

He dated TOWIE star Megan McKenna for seven months bfore they split in July 2018.

Sadly Mike died on March 15 this year.

(Image: Getty Images Europe)

Mike, 26, left a series of final messages in a black book where his body was found in parkland in Edmonton, North London.

The suicide notes left to his family show he intended to take his own life, North London Coroner's Court ruled.

Senior coroner Andrew Walker said: "There were a number of notes left behind and messages in which Mr Thalassitis clearly set out his intention that his life should come to an end."
description: From TOWIE to the West End... to flogging car air freshener on Instagram, just where are the cast of Love island these days?
